subject: [Ip-health] OUP book on TRIPS
body:
New book on TRIPS

FYI

You may be interested to know that Oxford University Press has published 'A
Commentary on the TRIPS Agreement' based on some of my previous work and new
materials on the subject. See
http://www.oup.com/us/catalog/general/subject/Law/PublicInternationalLaw/WTOandInternationalTrade/?view=usa&ci=9780199271283

Carlos Correa

_______________________________________________
